pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lorenz and Penalized Lorenz Regressions // Inference for the Lorenz and penalized Lorenz regressions. More broadly, the package proposes functions to assess inequality and graphically represent it. The Lorenz Regression procedure is introduced in Heuchenne and Jacquemain (2022) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2021.107347 and in Jacquemain, A., C. Heuchenne, and E. Pircalabelu (2024) doi:10.1214/23-EJS2200.
